titleStmt.title: Epitaphes, epigrams, songs and sonets with a discourse of the friendly affections of Tymetes to Pyndara his ladie. Newly corrected with additions, and set out by George Turbervile Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Turberville, George, 1540?-1610?

publicationStmt.publisher: Anno Domini. 1567. Imprinted at London, by Henry Denham,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
